text:
JOHN C. MACDONALD, age 32. Cherished son of William and Anne (nee Sharp); devoted brother of Robert Sharp-MacDonald and Laura MacDonald; loving uncle of Andrea, Robert Jr., Christopher, and Richard; dear grandson of late Charles and Marilyn Sharp, and John and Barbara MacDonald; caring nephew and cousin; warm-hearted friend to many.

In lieu of flowers donations are requested to Mary Queen of Peace Parish.

Funeral Mass will be held on Wednesday, May 17, 2023 at 10am, Mary Queen of Peace Parish, 4423 Pearl Rd., Cleveland, (PLEASE MEET AT CHURCH) with a private interment.

The family will receive friends TUESDAY, MAY 16, 4-7 PM at A. RIPEPI & SONS FUNERAL HOME, 18149 BAGLEY RD., MIDDLEBURG HTS (WEST OF I-71).

To send flowers to the family, please visit our floral store.
